devShells.doc: The `devShells` flake output contains derivations that provide a development environment for `nix develop`.

packages.doc: The `packages` flake output contains packages that can be added to a shell using `nix shell`.

dockerfile-language-server.shortDescription: A language server for Dockerfiles powered by Node.js, TypeScript, and VSCode technologies

dot-language-server.shortDescription: A language Server for the DOT language/Graphviz.

eslint.shortDescription: An AST-based pattern checker for JavaScript.

flake8.shortDescription: Flake8 is a wrapper around pyflakes, pycodestyle and mccabe.

flake8-import-order.shortDescription: Flake8 and pylama plugin that checks the ordering of import statements

gopls.shortDescription: Official language server for the Go language

htmlhint.shortDescription: Static code analysis tool for HTML

isort.shortDescription: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports

nim-language-server.shortDescription: Language Server Protocol implementation for Nim

nix-language-server.shortDescription: A work-in-progress language server for Nix, with syntax checking and basic completion

pyright.shortDescription: Type checker for the Python language

rust-analyzer.shortDescription: A modular compiler frontend for the Rust language

scry.shortDescription: Code analysis server for the Crystal programming language

standard.shortDescription: Standard style for JavaScript code out-of-box

statix.shortDescription: Lints and suggestions for the nix programming language

stylelint.shortDescription: Mighty CSS linter that helps you avoid errors and enforce conventions

stylelint-lsp.shortDescription: An implementation of the Language Server Protocol for stylelint

ts-standard.shortDescription: Standard style for TypeScript code out-of-box

typescript-language-server.shortDescription: Language Server Protocol implementation for TypeScript wrapping tsserver.

vale.shortDescription: A syntax-aware linter for prose built with speed and extensibility in mind

vint.shortDescription: Fast and Highly Extensible Vim script Language Lint implemented by Python
